```{r}
#| echo: false

# Compose the full profile
profile <- div(class = "people-profile",
  div(class = "people-header",
    div(class = "people-photo",
      img(src = photo)
    ),
    div(class = "people-info",
      p(class = "people-position", position),
      if (!is.null(faculty) & faculty != "") {p(class = "people-faculty", paste0("Faculty of ", faculty))},
      if (faculty == "" & !is.null(affiliate_organization)) {
        p(class = "people-faculty", affiliate_organization)
        },
      div(class = "people-contact", contact_items, social_links)
    )
  ),
  mission_block,
  # custom content would most likely go here, right after the mission_block
  div(class = "people-content",
    interests_block,
    publications_block
  )
)

# Render the profile
browsable(profile)
```
